name: Sky Explorer (Synwickes)
description:
Explore the sky ! Find out Entrance of the Fairyland !

This is a 3D platformer game and you will be jumping over the sky .  The real challenge will be inside the Sky Palace in this game , be ready to challenge yourself , and enjoy this fantasy journey!!

Game guide :

Use W S A D and Mouse to guide character to move and press space to jump !

Game Engine

Unity（3D Game Kit used）
